content:
TITLE: Starting Metro Server in React Native
DESCRIPTION: Commands to start Metro, the JavaScript bundler that comes with React Native. This is the first step before running your React Native application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/superwall/react-native-superwall.git/blob/main/example/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# using npm
npm start

# OR using Yarn
yarn start
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running React Native Application on iOS
DESCRIPTION: Commands to start your React Native application on an iOS simulator or device after Metro bundler is running.
SOURCE: https://github.com/superwall/react-native-superwall.git/blob/main/example/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# using npm
npm run ios

# OR using Yarn
yarn ios
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running React Native Application on Android
DESCRIPTION: Commands to start your React Native application on an Android device or emulator after Metro bundler is running.
SOURCE: https://github.com/superwall/react-native-superwall.git/blob/main/example/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# using npm
npm run android

# OR using Yarn
yarn android
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Superwall React Native Changelog Documentation
DESCRIPTION: A markdown document tracking version changes, enhancements, and fixes for the Superwall React Native SDK, including references to iOS and Android SDK version upgrades.
SOURCE: https://github.com/superwall/react-native-superwall.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# CHANGELOG

The changelog for `Superwall`. Also see the [releases](https://github.com/superwall/react-native-superwall/releases) on GitHub.

## 2.0.12

### Enhancements

- Adds `setLogLevel`.
- Upgrades Android SDK to 2.0.6 [View Android SDK release notes](https://github.com/superwall/Superwall-Android/releases/tag/2.0.6).

### Fixes

- Bug fixes for running the example app on Xcode 16.4.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies with Yarn
DESCRIPTION: Command to install required dependencies for each package in the monorepo using Yarn workspaces.
SOURCE: https://github.com/superwall/react-native-superwall.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
yarn
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting the Metro Packager for Example App
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Metro packager for the example application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/superwall/react-native-superwall.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
yarn example start
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Example App on Android
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the example application on Android device or emulator.
SOURCE: https://github.com/superwall/react-native-superwall.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
yarn example android
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Example App on iOS
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the example application on iOS simulator or device.
SOURCE: https://github.com/superwall/react-native-superwall.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
yarn example ios
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Unit Tests
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute the project's unit tests using Jest.
SOURCE: https://github.com/superwall/react-native-superwall.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
yarn test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Verifying TypeScript and ESLint Compliance
DESCRIPTION: Commands to verify that the code passes TypeScript type checking and ESLint validation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/superwall/react-native-superwall.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
yarn typecheck
yarn lint
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Publishing New Package Version to npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to publish new versions of the package to npm using release-it, which handles version bumping, tagging, and releasing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/superwall/react-native-superwall.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
yarn release
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Fixing Code Formatting Issues
DESCRIPTION: Command to automatically fix formatting errors detected by ESLint.
SOURCE: https://github.com/superwall/react-native-superwall.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
yarn lint --fix
```
